title: You can't believe in God because of suffering you see on TV? Hogwash!
description:
In what has become a political liturgy an Emory philosopher talks about his struggles to believe in God because his political expectations of what God should be doing are unfulfilled. In other words, because of Trump there is no God. If the politics of the world were more to his liking his it likely wouldn't change his ability to "believe in God". There are other things at play in this dynamic. 

NYT Piece https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/07/opinion/gun-violence-god-philosophy.html
